This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://dicom.nema.org/resources/ontology/DCM
    CodeDisplay
    121065Procedure Description
    121069Previous Finding
    121071Finding
    121073Impression
    121075Recommendation
    121077Conclusion
    121110Patient Presentation
    121111Summary
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    11329-0History
    55115-0Request
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008/version/20190731
    CodeDisplay
    116224001Complication of Procedure
